meanings.definition: A substance that causes a liquid to solidify or thicken.
meanings.sent1: The congealer turned the milk into a thick pudding.
meanings.sent2: The congealer added to the soup made it into a jelly-like consistency.
meanings.sent3: The congealer in the recipe made the sauce as hard as a rock!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a congealer, turning their doubts into solid support.
meanings.sent5: The congealer worked its magic, transforming the liquid into a firm gel.

meanings.sent4: His words acted as a congealer, solidifying their resolve.
